verses.verse: And Rehoboam<WH7346> went<WH3212> to Shechem<WH7927>: for all Israel<WH3478> were come<WH935> to Shechem<WH7927> to make him king<WH4427>.

And it came to pass<WH3478>, when all Israel heard<WH8085> that Jeroboam<WH3379> was returned<WH7725>, that they sent<WH7971> and called<WH7121> him unto the congregation<WH5712>, and made him king<WH4427> over all Israel<WH3478>: there was none that followed<WH310> the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732>, but<WH2108> the tribe<WH7626> of Judah only<WH3063>.

But the word<WH1697> of God<WH430> came unto Shemaiah<WH8098> the man<WH376> of God<WH430>, saying<WH559>,
